hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:After offering the Sunna of the Fajr prayer, the Prophet (ﷺ) used to talk to me, if I happened to be awake; otherwise he would lie down till the Iqama call was proclaimed (for the Fajr prayer)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَحَدَّثَ بَعْدَ الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ وَلَمْ يَضْطَجِعْ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever talks after offering two Rak'a (Sunna) (of the Fajr prayer)
